title: About me
text:
I only believe in information that is backed by concrete research evidence and sound journalism.
If someone tells me about a fact, I will check Google Scholar/Research Gate for a credible research paper, then check the references of that research paper until I read the original research.
After living in the heart of Europe for more than 1 year, I have become very mindful of my consumption habits as they impact the environment, and I am now a minimalist.
My greatest achievement so far: the strong bond I have with my family members.

title: Trieu Le
text:
Hi! This is Triều. Thanks for stopping by! I am doing a Master’s in International Business Economics and Management at KU Leuven, Belgium.
Three values that I am known for: detail-oriented, honest and ethical.
For me, every encounter is a chance to share and to learn.
Feel free to be in touch with me!

title: Work experience
text:
My goal is to get exposed to as many technical and business roles as possible.
My resume

title: How I stay more productive
text:
I use SelfControl application to block my access to distracting websites (Instagram, Tiktok, Facebook, etc.). The application is free and open-source. I highly recommend it! Even if you restart the computer or delete the application, access to those sites will remain restricted until the designated time expires.
I use Bitwarden to store my passwords and generate random passwords for random websites.
